properties.title: The magic forest from Ernen
properties.abstract: The magical forest from the squirrel Brüna is an ideal half or full day outing for families with children between the ages of 3 - 10 years. There are almost 20 different posts where the children can play with nature. Barbecue pits allows you to linger.
properties.description:
Brüna's magical forest is not imaginary. There really is such a place. It is located on the Wasen, between Ernen, a wonderfull village of the valley of Goms in Valais and Ausserbinn. In 2007, integrated between the red firs and the moss-filled boulders, an adventure trail was built by the non-profit Zauberwald Fondation. On the almost 20 posts the children can play with nature and let their fantasy take over. Barbecue pits, tables/benches and drinking water allows you to linger.

The story of Brüna is also available as a children's book (in german) and a CD (german/french/italian). It is Andreas Weissen's first children's book. He is a famous Oberwalliser legend narrator. It is illustrated by Pauline Rey.
